name: Dhal Curry (Parippu Curry)
description: Creamy red lentil curry with coconut milk and tempered spices
instructions: In a pot, combine lentils, water, turmeric, and salt
Bring to a boil and simmer for 20 minutes until lentils are soft
Add coconut milk and chili powder; simmer for 5 minutes
For tempering: heat oil in a small pan
Add mustard seeds and cumin; let them splutter
Add curry leaves, onions, garlic, and green chilies (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
Pour tempering over the dhal curry
cultural_notes: Dhal curry is a staple in Sri Lankan cuisine, eaten daily with rice

sinhala: පරිප්පු මදි වැඩියෙන් තම්බා රස අඩු වේ
english: Don't overcook lentils or they'll become mushy

description_sinhala: පොල් කිරි සහ තෙම්පරාදු කළ කුළුබඩු සහිත ක්‍රීම් රතු පරිප්පු කරිය
description_tamil: தேங்காய் பால் மற்றும் பதப்படுத்தப்பட்ட மசாலாப் பொருட்களுடன் கிரீம் சிவப்பு பருப்பு கறி
cultural_notes_sinhala: පරිප්පු ව්‍යංජනය ශ්‍රී ලාංකීය ආහාරවල ප්‍රධාන ආහාරයක් වන අතර එය දිනපතා බත් සමඟ අනුභව කරනු ලැබේ
cultural_notes_tamil: பருப்பு கறி இலங்கை உணவு வகைகளில் பிரதானமானது, தினமும் அரிசியுடன் உண்ணப்படுகிறது
